name: Timers
description:
Excuse me, could you give me a second?

Venture through time in search of magic hourglasses, with a lot of logic challenges.

Credits

Felipe Nunes (@feedlipe) - Game Designer

Igor Ferreira (@biemorth) - Programmer, Artist

Romualdo Santos (@romuboy) - Level Designer

Contact Info

feedlipe@gmail.com | @feedlipe

Controls

Arrows/WASD: Control the character.

X: Speeds up the time, but you can't move while you're using it.

Z: Inverts the progression of time.

Esc/P: Pause menu.

Check my other games!
